source.9921b4d9:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.figure(figsize=(20,5))
plt.subplot(1,2,1)
plt.plot(acc,label='training accuracy')
plt.plot(val_ac,label = 'validation accuracy')
plt.xlabel('epochs')
plt.ylabel('accuracy')
plt.legend()
plt.grid()
plt.subplot(1,2,2)
plt.plot(lo,label='training loss')
plt.plot(val_lo,label = 'validation loss')
plt.xlabel('epochs')
plt.ylabel('loss')
plt.legend() 
plt.grid()
